The claim originated from an email alleg: s brother Tony, mentioning "spirit cooking" and a video of a performance by artist Marina Abramovic.
Hillary Clinton was not a recipient in t: and John Podesta did not respond to the emails, indicating no direct involvement in the alleged satanic ritual.
The term: spirit cooking" does not refer to a satanic ritual but was an art project created by Marina Abramovic in 1996, involving cooking events that did not feature bodily fluids as mentioned in her cookbook.
